name: The Programming and Code Style Guide Neoteric Design, Inc
body:
# Tread lightly, for the documents that you browse are holy. 
First and foremost, remember the words of Robert 'Uncle Bob' Martin: 
> your team's code should be your coding documentation

Remember this, even after your time on these pages has passed.

## Big ups to Nic 'Aitch' Haynes making this happen.
He watches over these standards, and none shall pass until they are met!
tagline: Code so clean, your mother would be proud
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
